Reference

Exported Functions

Functions exported by kenpomR

cbb_espn_game_all()

Get ESPN Data (Pbp, Team and Player Box)

cbb_espn_pbp()

Get ESPN PBP

cbb_espn_team_box()

Get ESPN Team Box

cbb_espn_player_box()

Get ESPN Player Box

get_efficiency()

Get KenPom Efficiency and Tempo Summary

get_fourfactors()

Get Four Factors Data

get_pomeroy_ratings()

Get KenPom Ratings

get_pointdist()

Get Team Points Distribution

get_height()

Get Heights, Experience, Bench and Continuity Data

get_foul_trouble()

Get 2-Foul Participation Stats

get_playerstats()

Get Player Stats Leaders by Metric

get_player_career()

Get Player Career Stats from Player Page

get_team_players()

Get Player Stats from Team Page

get_minutes_matrix()

Get Minutes Matrix from Expanded Player Page

get_team_schedule()

Get Team Schedule Results

get_team_player_stats()

Get Team Player Stats

get_box()

Get Game Box Score

get_winprob()

Get Win Probability

get_gameplan()

Get Game Plan for Team

get_opptracker()

Get Opponent Tracker for Team

get_teamstats()

Get Team Stats

get_team_depth_chart()

Get Depth Chart Last 5 Games from Team Page

get_team_lineups()

Get Lineups Last 5 Games from Team Page

get_team_history()

Get Team Efficiency History

get_records_team()

Get Single-Game Records for Team

get_program_ratings()

Get Program Ratings

get_kpoy()

Get KPoY Leaders Tables

get_trends()

Get Division-I statistical trends

get_hca()

Get Home Court Advantage Estimates

get_game_attrs()

Get Game Attributes

get_fanmatch()

Get FanMatch by date

get_officials()

Get officials rankings

get_arenas()

Get Home Court Arenas

get_coach_history()

Get Coaching Resume

get_pomeroy_archive_ratings()

Get KenPom Ratings Archive

get_conf()

Get Conference-wide Stats

get_confstats()

Get Conference Comparison Stats

get_confhistory()

Get Conference Historical Ratings

login()

User Login Function Requires a subscription to KenPom.com

check_internet()

Utilities and Helpers for package

check_status()

Check Status function

clean_team_names_NCAA_merge()

Clean KenPom Data Frame Team Names to match NCAA Team Names for easier merging

teams_links

Teams Dictionary Team link reference lookup for the package
